PhD related.title: Research Fellow of the F.R.S.-FNRS (PhD Thesis)
PhD related.description:
Title: Improvement of the state of the art regarding the theory of learning algorithms for automata models extended with resources and its applications to black-box model-checking.

Supervisors: [Véronique Bruyère](http://informatique.umons.ac.be/perso/Bruyere.Veronique/) (UMONS) and [Guillermo A. Perez](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/staff/guillermoalberto-perez/) (UAntwerpen).

PhD related.title: Research Stay
PhD related.description: Research stay to collaborate with Frits W. Vaandrager.

Studies related.title: Master's Thesis
Studies related.description:
Title: Efficient Learning of Automata and Automata with One Counter.

Supervisor: [Véronique Bruyère](http://informatique.umons.ac.be/perso/Bruyere.Veronique/) (UMONS).
Grade: 19/20.

Studies related.title: Internship
Studies related.description:
Implementation of an active learning algorithm for visibly one-counter automata.

Supervisor: [Guillermo A. Perez](https://www.uantwerpen.be/en/staff/guillermoalberto-perez/) (UAntwerpen).

Studies related.title: Research initiation internship
Studies related.description:
Subject: Efficient algorithms for Nash equilibrium computation.

Supervisors: [Aline Goeminne](https://alinegoeminne.github.io/), [Thomas Brihaye](http://math.umons.ac.be/maef/fr/tbrihaye.html), [Véronique Bruyère](http://informatique.umons.ac.be/staff/Bruyere.Veronique/), and [Hadrien Mélot](http://informatique.umons.ac.be/staff/Melot.Hadrien/).
